sei.title: SEI Emotional Intelligence
sei.subtitle: Six Seconds Emotional Intelligence Model
sei.pursuits.K.desc: Increase self-awareness, understand what you feel and why.
sei.pursuits.C.desc: Manage your emotions and behaviors intentionally.
sei.pursuits.G.desc: Put your vision and intentions into action with empathy and purpose.
sei.competencies.title: Emotional Intelligence Competencies
sei.competencies.EL.benefits: Personal clarity, better emotional language, self-awareness
sei.competencies.ACT.desc: Evaluate costs and benefits before acting.
sei.competencies.NE.risks: Getting trapped in negative emotions, emotional avoidance
sei.competencies.IM.risks: Lack of commitment, dependence on external motivators
sei.competencies.NG.benefits: Resilience, inspiring leadership, sense of life
sei.levels.title: Competency Levels
sei.levels.challenge.desc: Needs to develop emotional awareness and self-management.
sei.levels.emerging.desc: Begins to recognize emotions and use them functionally.
sei.levels.functional.desc: Integrates thinking and emotion with consistent balance.
sei.levels.expert.desc: Masters emotional intelligence with purpose and leadership.
sei.outcomes.title: Success Factors
sei.brainTalents.title: Brain Talents (Brain Apps)
sei.brainTalents.dataMining.desc: Filter key information from large volumes.
sei.brainTalents.vision.desc: Have a clear and inspiring north.
sei.brainStyles.title: Brain Styles (Brain Brief)
sei.brainStyles.visionary.strengths: Inspires, Sees the big picture, Motivates change
sei.brainStyles.inventor.facilitation: Mind maps + space to explore + connections
sei.brainStyles.doer.risks: Runs over, Ignores details, Impatient with processes
sei.brainStyles.sage.facilitation: Deep meaning + time to reflect + values
pricing.subtitle: Start free and scale when you need it. No surprises, no hidden costs.
pricing.tokens.title: What are AI tokens?
pricing.tokens.description: Tokens measure your AI feature usage. Each interaction with Rowi consumes tokens based on complexity.
pricing.comparison.title: Detailed comparison
pricing.comparison.subtitle: Compare all features of each plan to find the one that best fits your needs.
pricing.faq.title: Frequently asked questions
pricing.faq.changePlan.a: Yes, you can change plans at any time. Changes are reflected in your next billing cycle.
pricing.faq.trial.a: The Free plan is free forever. For paid plans, we offer a 14-day no-commitment trial.
pricing.faq.tokens.q: What if I run out of tokens?
pricing.faq.tokens.a: We'll notify you when you're close to the limit. You can buy additional tokens or wait until next month.
pricing.faq.family.q: How does the Family plan work?
pricing.faq.family.a: You can invite up to 6 family members. Each has their own profile and they share the plan's tokens.
pricing.contact.title: Have questions?
pricing.contact.subtitle: Our team is ready to help you find the perfect plan for you or your organization.
register.selectPlan.title: Choose your perfect plan
register.selectPlan.description: Select the plan that best fits your needs. You can always change later.
